title: Cedric the Entertainer to Remy Ma and Papoose Interview
itunes:title: Cedric the Entertainer to Remy Ma and Papoose Interview
description:
Monday 10/1 - Today on the show we had comedian Cedric the Entertainer stop by where he spoke about his new show "The Neighborhood", black renaissance in Hollywood and more. Also, some family stopped by, Remy Ma and Papoose who came to speak about their new show, preparing for her pregnancy and more. Charalamagne also gave the hee haw to Lindsay Lohan for accusing refugee parents of trafficking, and trying to take their kids. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
